stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements is true?

features.html: A block is connected by a string to a sphere. The block is on a ramp inclined at an angle of 30 ° to the horizontal, as shown. The string passes over a pulley of negligible mass and friction, and the sphere hangs freely. The block accelerates down the ramp with negligible friction.

choicesHtml: The mass of the sphere is greater than the mass of the block.
The mass of the sphere is equal to the mass of the block.
The weight of the sphere is greater than the component of the block’s weight along the ramp.
The weight of the sphere is less than the component of the block’s weight along the ramp.
